name: mapc_id
description: MAPC Assigned Parcel ID

name: muni_id
description: Standard Numeric Municipal ID (assigned by MA DOR)

name: muni
description: Name of Municipality

name: parloc_id
description: LOC ID from Level 3 Parcel assessors tables. Unique parcel ID based on latitude-longitude of parcel centroid; assigned by MassGIS

name: poly_typ
description: Indicates type of ownership:  FEE, TAX, ROW, WATER, PRIV_ROW, RAIL_ROW

name: map_num
description: Local assessors map sheet number that contains the parcel

name: mappar_id
description: Parcel ID appearing on the original assessors map

name: loc_id_cnt
description: Count of Assessors records for each parcel (more than one if condominium)

name: land_value
description: Sum of assessed land value for all associated assessors records. Generally zero for condominiums where land value is allocated among individual condo deeds. Value in $

name: bldg_value
description: Sum of assessed building value for all associated assessors records.  For condominiums, generally includes land value. Value in $

name: othr_value
description: Sum of assessed value for accessory buildings or other improvements on all associated assessors records. Value in $

name: total_value
description: Sum of total assessed value for all associated assessors records. Value in $

name: ls_price
description: Last sale price, aggregated (sum of) assessorÕs records for each parcel. Value in $Ê Ê

name: ls_date
description: Date of most recent last sale from all associated assessors records, maximum value among assessorÕs records for each parcel. Value in YYYYMMDD

name: bldg_area
description: Aggregated (sum) of assessorÕs records of BLD_AREA (finished building area) for each parcel. AssessorsÕ methods vary widely but gross building area may include garages, stairwells, basements, and other uninhabitable areas. (MassGIS field BLD_AREA). Units: square feet

name: res_area
description: Total residential living area aggregated (sum of) assessorÕs records for each parcel. Assessors methods vary widely but net building area may exclude garages, stairwells, basements, and other uninhabitable areas (MassGIS field RES_AREA). Units: square feet.

name: luc_1
description: The minimum property type classification code found on all of the associated assessors records; may include non-standard codes assigned by local staff

name: luc_2
description: The maximum property type classification code found on all of the associated assessors records; may include non-standard codes assigned by local staff

name: luc_adj_1
description: The minimum property type classification code, after non-standard codes were assigned by MAPC to the best match of standard codes

name: luc_adj_2
description: The maximum property type classification code, after non-standard codes were assigned by MAPC to the best match of standard codes

name: num_units
description: Number of units reported on assessors records, aggregated (sum of) assessorÕs records for each parcel.

name: units_est
description: MAPC's best estimate of number of units, based on comparing the reported units, count of assessors records, and reported classification code

name: units_src
description: Source of estimated units.  units_nu = reported units; luc_adju = MAPC estimate based on use code; loc_idcn = count of associated assessors records for the parcel

name: num_rooms
description: Total room count as determined by assessor, Êaggregated (sum of) assessorÕs records for each parcel; may be absent for some property types or non-comparable across municipalities

name: yr_built
description: Most recent year built on associated assessors records, format YYYY

name: site_addr
description: Address

name: addr_str
description: Street

name: addr_num
description: Street Number

name: addr_zip
description: Zip Code

name: owner_name
description: Owner Name

name: owner_addr
description: Owner Address

name: owner_city
description: Owner City

name: owner_stat
description: Owner State

name: owner_zip
description: Owner Zip Code

name: fy
description: Fiscal Year of the assessors data from which the information was extracted. Range: 2009-2014 (format: YYYY)

name: lot_areaft
description: Calculated by MAPC based on digital parcel boundary. May include water area. Units: square feet.

name: far
description: A measure of density calculated by MAPC using either Gross or Finished building area (whichever is greater) divided by the Lot Area

name: pct_imperv
description: MAPC estimate of impervious cover (buildings and pavement) on the parcel based on a combination of MassGIS's impervious surface layer (2005) and building rooftop layer (2012)

name: pct_bldg
description: Percent of parcel estimated to be covered by a building

name: pct_pave
description: Percent of parcel that is non-rooftop impervious surface; may include parking areas, internal roadways, sidewalks, patios, or sandy/rocky ground.

name: landv_pac
description: Assessed land value divided by lot area in acres. Units: $/acre

name: Bldgv_psf
description: Assessed building value divided by the building/finished area in sq ft (recorded by assessors). Units: $/square foot.

name: totv_pac
description: Total assessed value divided by lot area in acres

name: bldlnd_rat
description: Improvement value (building + other values) divided by total land value, where available

name: sqm_imperv
description: MAPC estimate of impervious cover (buildings and pavement) on the parcel based on a combination of MassGIS's impervious surface layer (2005) and building rooftop layer (2012) Units: square meters

name: sqm_bldg
description: Parcel area estimated to be covered by a building.  Units: square meters

name: sqm_pave
description: Parcel area that is non-rooftop impervious surface; may include parking areas, internal roadways, sidewalks, patios, or sandy/rocky ground.   Units: square meters

name: Shape_Length
description: Shape_Length

name: Shape_Area
description: Shape_Area
